actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER SET
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_CIN` = {{InputCIN.text}},
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_BY` ={{SelectRegulatedBy.selectedOptionValue}},
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_CERT`={{InputRegCertNo.text}},
`CUSTOMER_REGISTEREDWITH` = "MCA",
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_ISSUEDATE` ={{moment(DateOfIssue.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_FINANCIER_TYPE`={{SelectFinancierType.selectedOptionValue}},
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_FINANCIER_TYPE_OTHERS` = {{InputFinancierTypeOthers.text}},
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_WEBSITE` = {{InputWebsite.text}},
`CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID` = {{InputLEI.text}},
CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_DATE = {{moment(appsmith.store.vayCinRegDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
	CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_PLACE = {{appsmith.store.vayCinRegPlace}}
WHERE `OID` ={{appsmith.store.customerOID}}
